mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_group WHERE person_id = #{personId} AND group_member_level = #{groupMemberLevel}

SELECT g.group_no, g.trip_no, t.trip_title, g.person_id, g.group_member_level, g.approve_state_cd, a.approve_state_nm, g.group_apply_date, g.group_approve_date, g.group_drop_date FROM tb_group g JOIN tb_trip t ON g.trip_no = t.trip_no JOIN tb_approve_state a ON g.approve_state_cd = a.approve_state_cd WHERE g.person_id = #{personId} AND t.trip_delete_date is null AND g.group_member_level = #{groupMemberLevel} ORDER BY g.group_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
